title: CLEMENCE, 1.50 CARAT 15 STONE STRAND NECKLACE, GOLD
description: The Clemence necklace features a delicate strand of 15 0.10-carat round-cut stones bezel-set in 18-karat gold-coated sterling silver. Adjustable for your preferred fit.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold-coated sterling silver or 14K yellow gold
Setting: Bezel set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire or lab-grown diamonds
Stone Shape: Round cut
Closure: Spring ring
Chain Length: 16 inches or 17 inches
This necklace includes a loop to adjust the necklace shorter by 1 inch. If you purchase the 16-inch, this includes 15 inches + a 1-inch extension. If you purchase the 17-inch, this includes 16 inches + a 1-inch extension.



15 3MM stones, 1.50 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphires or 1.50 CTW  E/F VS1  lab-grown diamonds

What is Lab-Grown?
